articles.title: Fewest Americans collecting jobless aid since 1970 - The Associated Press - en Español
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Applications for unemployment benefits inched down last week as the total number of Americans collecting aid fell to its lowest level in more than 50 years. Jobless claims fell by 2,000 to 184,000 last week, the Labor Department said Thursda…
